For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Free Battle Mode In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! Changes for the App Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game! Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play: - New auto-save feature - New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual) - New battle assist feature (casual only) - Improved controls for battle and free movement - New retry feature for missions - Improved mini-game UI - Improved tutorial Play Notes - This game contains violent content. - Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay. - æœ¬éŠæˆ²éƒ¨ä»½å…§å®¹æ¶‰åŠæš´åŠ›æƒ…ç¯€ - è«‹æ³¨æ„éŠæˆ²æ™‚é–“,é¿å…æ²‰è¿· [Number of Players] This is a single-player game only. entry.content:

  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!ï¼š$10.00
  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!ï¼š$150.00
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster Packï¼š$90.00

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar â€” your personal guide to the planetâ€™s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 â€” World Wetlands Day March 3 â€” World Wildlife Day March 21 â€” International Day of Forests March 22 â€” World Water Day March 23 â€” World Meteorological Day April 7 â€” World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 â€” Earth Day May 22 â€” International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 â€” World Environment Day June 8 â€” World Oceans Day June 17 â€” World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 â€” World Nature Conservation Day September 16 â€” International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 â€” World Animal Day October 13 â€” International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 â€” International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 â€” International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)
